summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.1°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 655 m), light levels (up 3483 lux), and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1605 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5495 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 655.4m lower than yesterday, 544.8m lower than the past week, 1604.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 1068.9m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1613.7m and 2670m.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and calm and still conditions are expected. Showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and periods of sunshine are expected. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
